text: Guram Dochanashvili (; 26 March 1939 â€“ 3 April 2021) was a Georgian writer and historian. He was popular for his short stories, beginning in the 1960s. He was known for his The First Garment book series. Dochanashvili was hospitalized on 1 April 2021 in Tbilisi. His condition was critical and he died two days later, aged 82.Acclaimed Georgian writer Guram Dochanashvili dies at 82 ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Writers from Georgia (country)
title: Guram Dochanashvili
